title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: 250g Spaghetti or pasta. 300g minced beef. 200g tomato sauce. 1 onion. 2 cloves garlic. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions. Brown the minced beef in olive oil. Chop and saute the onion and garlic. Add the tomato sauce to the beef and simmer.

title: Vegetarian Curry
ingredients: 200g mixed vegetables carrots, peas, potatoes. 1 can coconut milk 400ml. 1 tbsp curry powder. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Chop the vegetables. Saute them with curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes. Add coconut milk. Let it simmer for 15 minutes.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 2 slices bread. 2 slices cheese. 1 tbsp butter.
steps: Butter the bread. Place cheese between the slices of bread. Grill the sandwich in a pan until golden brown on both sides.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: 100g lettuce. 50g Parmesan cheese. 2 tbsp Caesar dressing. 1 slice bread for croutons.
steps: Chop the lettuce. Grate the Parmesan cheese. Make croutons by toasting the bread. Toss the lettuce, cheese, dressing, and croutons together.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: 400g canned tomatoes. 1 onion. 2 cloves garlic. 1 tbsp olive oil. 500ml vegetable stock.
steps: Chop the onion and garlic. Saute in olive oil until soft. Add the tomatoes and vegetable stock. Simmer for 15 minutes and blend.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 300g chicken breast. 1 bell pepper. 1 onion. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Chop the chicken and vegetables. Stirfry the chicken in olive oil. Add the vegetables and soy sauce. Cook until tender.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: 250g minced beef. 1 taco seasoning packet. 6 taco shells. 100g shredded lettuce. 50g cheese.
steps: Cook the minced beef with the taco seasoning. Fill the taco shells with beef, lettuce, and cheese.

title: Mac and Cheese
ingredients: 200g macaroni pasta. 150g cheddar cheese. 250ml milk. 1 tbsp butter. 1 tbsp flour.
steps: Cook the macaroni. In a pan, melt the butter. Add flour. Gradually add the milk to make a sauce. Stir in the cheese until melted. Combine with the macaroni.

title: Chicken Salad
ingredients: 200g chicken breast. 50g mixed greens. 1 tomato. 1 cucumber. 2 tbsp ranch dressing.
steps: Cook the chicken breast and slice it. Chop the vegetables. Toss all ingredients together with the dressing.

title: Egg Fried Rice
ingredients: 200g rice. 2 eggs. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp sesame oil. 1 onion.
steps: Cook the rice. Scramble the eggs in a pan. Stir fry the chopped onion in sesame oil. Add the rice, eggs, and soy sauce. Stir until heated through.

title: Chicken Nuggets
ingredients: 300g chicken breast. 1 cup breadcrumbs. 1 egg. 1 tbsp flour. Salt and pepper.
steps: Cut the chicken into nugget sized pieces. Coat in flour, dip in egg, and coat in breadcrumbs. Bake or fry until golden brown.

title: Vegetable Soup
ingredients: 200g mixed vegetables (carrots, potatoes, peas). 500ml vegetable stock. 1 onion. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Chop the vegetables and onion. Saute the onion in olive oil. Add the vegetables and stock. Simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Beef Stew
ingredients: 400g beef stew meat. 2 carrots. 2 potatoes. 500ml beef stock. 1 onion.
steps: Brown the beef in a pan. Chop the vegetables and add them to the pot with the beef. Pour in the stock and simmer for 1 hour.

title: Shrimp Pasta
ingredients: 200g pasta. 200g shrimp. 1 garlic clove. 1 tbsp olive oil. 100ml cream.
steps: Cook the pasta. Saute the shrimp and garlic in olive oil. Add the cream and cooked pasta. Mix everything together.

title: Fish and Chips
ingredients: 2 fish fillets. 2 large potatoes. 1 tbsp flour. 1 egg. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Cut the potatoes into fries and bake. Coat the fish fillets in flour, dip in beaten egg. fry until crispy. Serve with the fries.

title: Cheese Quesadilla
ingredients: 2 tortillas. 100g cheese. 1 tbsp butter.
steps: Place the cheese between the tortillas. Heat a pan with butter. Cook the quesadilla on both sides until golden brown.

title: Fried Chicken
ingredients: 4 chicken pieces. 1 cup flour. 1 tsp paprika. Salt and pepper. Oil for frying.
steps: Coat the chicken in flour and seasoning. Fry the chicken in hot oil until golden and crispy.

title: Lasagna
ingredients: 300g ground beef. 200g tomato sauce. 1 onion. 200g lasagna noodles. 200g cheese.
steps: Cook the beef and onions. Layer the noodles, beef sauce, and cheese in a baking dish. Bake at 180 degrees for 40 minutes.

title: Tuna Salad
ingredients: 1 can tuna. 50g mixed greens. 1 cucumber. 1 tomato. 2 tbsp mayo.
steps: Drain the tuna. Chop the vegetables and mix with tuna and mayo.

title: Beef Stir Fry
ingredients: 300g beef strips. 1 bell pepper. 1 onion. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Stir fry the beef in olive oil. Add the vegetables and soy sauce. Cook until tender.

title: Chicken Wrap
ingredients: 200g cooked chicken breast. 1 tortilla. 50g lettuce. 2 tbsp ranch dressing.
steps: Chop the chicken. Place on the tortilla with lettuce and ranch dressing. Roll up the wrap.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
ingredients: 300g chicken breast. 1 bell pepper. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 2 tbsp vinegar. 2 tbsp sugar.
steps: Stir fry the chicken and vegetables. Add the soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Simmer until the sauce thickens.

title: BBQ Ribs
ingredients: 500g pork ribs. 100g BBQ sauce. Salt and pepper.
steps: Season the ribs with salt and pepper. Bake for 1 hour at 180°C. Brush with BBQ sauce and bake for an additional 15 minutes.

title: Grilled Salmon
ingredients: 2 salmon fillets. 1 tbsp olive oil. Salt and pepper.
steps: Brush the salmon with olive oil, season with salt and pepper. Grill for 5-7 minutes on each side.

title: Minestrone Soup
ingredients: 200g mixed vegetables. 400g canned tomatoes. 500ml vegetable stock. 1 onion.
steps: Saute the onion. Add the vegetables, tomatoes, and stock. Simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell peppers. 200g rice. 300g minced beef. 1 onion. 200g tomato sauce.
steps: Cook the rice and beef. Stuff the peppers with the mixture and bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

title: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
ingredients: 200g spaghetti. 2 cloves garlic. 1 tbsp olive oil. Red pepper flakes.
steps: Cook the spaghetti. Saute the garlic in olive oil. Toss the spaghetti with garlic and red pepper flakes.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: 200g mozzarella. 100g tomatoes. Fresh basil. 2 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Slice the mozzarella and tomatoes. Arrange them with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Tomato Bruschetta
ingredients: 4 slices bread. 2 tomatoes. 1 clove garlic. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Toast the bread. Chop the tomatoes and garlic. Mix with olive oil and top the toasted bread.

title: Veggie Burger
ingredients: 1 can beans. 1 carrot. 50g breadcrumbs. 1 egg.
steps: Mash the beans and grate the carrot. Mix with breadcrumbs and egg. Form into patties and fry.

title: Chicken Parmesan
ingredients: 2 chicken breasts. 100g tomato sauce. 100g mozzarella cheese. 50g Parmesan cheese.
steps: Bread the chicken and fry. Top with tomato sauce and cheese. Bake for 15 minutes at 180°C.

title: Garlic Bread
ingredients: 1 baguette. 2 cloves garlic. 50g butter.
steps: Mix crushed garlic with butter. Spread on the baguette and bake at 180°C for 10 minutes.

title: Baked Potatoes
ingredients: 4 potatoes. 1 tbsp olive oil. Salt and pepper.
steps: Rub the potatoes with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Bake at 200°C for 45 minutes.

title: Beef Tostadas
ingredients: 250g minced beef. 4 tostada shells. 100g shredded lettuce. 50g cheese.
steps: Cook the beef with seasonings. Fill the tostada shells with beef, lettuce, and cheese.

title: Frittata
ingredients: 4 eggs. 100g mixed vegetables. 50g cheese. Salt and pepper.
steps: Whisk the eggs and mix with vegetables and cheese. Pour into a pan and cook until set.

title: Corn on the Cob
ingredients: 4 ears of corn. 1 tbsp butter. Salt.
steps: Boil the corn for 10 minutes. Butter and salt before serving.

title: Fried Rice
ingredients: 200g rice. 2 eggs. 1 onion. 2 tbsp soy sauce.
steps: Scramble the eggs and stir fry the onion. Add the rice and soy sauce. Stir until heated through.
